text: I really appreciate the great care from all of the hospital staff from triage all the way through my diagnosis. Everyone was very caring and although I didn't want to find out that I had broken my ankle, everyone was amazing and caring. Thank you very much to everyone including the security who was extremely helpful as well!

My daughter had a CT scan here today!

Dr. Gordon’s hospitality and cheerful demeanor made a significant difference during my mom’s CT scan visit. His positivity instantly lifted our spirits, and we felt genuinely cared for. I highly recommend this hospital for its exceptional care and service.

From the minute you walk in the front door to the end you are treated with respect and kind. The wait time is not that long and everyone is helpful and understanding. I want to say thank you to the nurses and doctors who helped us all through this difficult time.

The staff in the Emergency and Imaging departments were excellent to deal with during a recent health scare in the family. There were some critical cases causing some wait times for us (totally understandable), but at no time did we feel neglected.

Extremely happy to have this hospital in the park. Close to home and the two times a have been in emergency I have never had an issue. Staff are amazing. Couldn’t ask for more. Thanks to all staff for always working hard and taking great care of all your patients.

Bad experience here - had a fractured ankle, saw 3 different doctors here, each said different things about the injury. Received no information about how it would heal and treatment plan. The beds, however, are very comfortable if you need a good nap.

Horrible stuff and horrible treatment of patients. Nurses are rude and very inexperienced in what they do. IV was extremely painful. One RN told me that they have sick people here and they cant do anything. Well i wouldn't have come to ER if i was ok. Worst ER experience ever. Avoid this one.

They explained everything that was going to happen during the procedure and made me laugh & smile.  Thumbs up to these Healthcare Workers!

Nothing special about triage.  Same kind of waiting your expect from any other ER.  I can only praise the therapists....Visited me in the ER in a timely manner.  Caring, informed and by no means, "Just doing there job".  They get 5 stars.  As for the ER and triage.  1!
update: this hospital has significantly improved since we were here last. Extremely compassionate care staff.

It's very clean and staff can be friendly.. when they're not joking around and socializing at their desks.. very unprofessional.
